name: EXT_disjoint_timer_query
description: The EXT_disjoint_timer_query extension is part of the WebGL API and provides a way to measure the duration of a set of GL commands, without stalling the rendering pipeline.

members.name: ext.isQueryEXT()
members.description: Returns true if a given object is a WebGLQuery.

members.name: ext.beginQueryEXT()
members.description: The timer starts when all commands prior to beginQueryEXT have been fully executed.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: A GLenum specifying the target of the time query. Must be ext.TIME_ELAPSED_EXT.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A WebGLQuery object for which to start the time querying.

members.name: ext.endQueryEXT()
members.description: The timer stops when all commands prior to endQueryEXT have been fully executed.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: A GLenum specifying the target of the time query. Must be ext.TIME_ELAPSED_EXT.

members.name: ext.queryCounterEXT()
members.description: Records the current time into the corresponding query object.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A WebGLQuery object for which to record the current time.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: A GLenum specifying the target of the time query. Must be ext.TIMESTAMP_EXT.

members.name: ext.getQueryEXT()
members.description: Returns information about a query target.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: A GLenum specifying the target of the time query. Must be ext.TIMESTAMP_EXT or ext.TIME_ELAPSED_EXT.

parameters.name: pname
parameters.description: A GLenum specifying which information to return. Must be ext.CURRENT_QUERY_EXT or ext.QUERY_COUNTER_BITS_EXT.

members.name: ext.getQueryObjectEXT()
members.description: Return the state of a query object.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A WebGLQuery object from which to return information.

parameters.name: pname
parameters.description: A GLenum specifying which information to return. Must be ext.QUERY_RESULT_EXT or ext.QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE_EXT.
